none: The T.V. Dinners / Undone - "We Love Tama" split
The T.V. Dinners / Undone - "We Love Tama" split

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on June 09, 2021 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Meandering and wistful Japanese emo sharing space with rough, chaotic Japanese emo. Like on tour there in 2001, when we played with 1000 TRAVELS OF JAWAHARLAL and then we played with ENVY are few days later. But we also played with 324 and FUCK ON THE BEACK on the same tour....hardcore is awesome. WE LOVE TAMA

seo.title: The T.V. Dinners / Undone - "We Love Tama" split - Terminal Escape
